archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Monitor Capacity
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Monitor available planned and actual capacity and capacity demand. Suggest adjustments based on monitoring results.

properties.value: Monitor Capacity monitors available planned and actual capacity and capacity demand. It suggest adjustments based on monitoring results. Results may include differences between allocated capacity and its associated capacity and capacity demand. Factors that are monitored include planned and actual capacity and capacity demand changes such as unexpected reductions or unexpected increases in planned or actual product sales or planned or available infrastructure.
